hero.heading: THE ART OF
hero.description: Premium t-shirts designed for those who appreciate the subtle details. Crafted for longevity, styled for the modern era.

philosophy.label: OUR PHILOSOPHY
philosophy.heading: CRAFTED FOR THE DISCERNING FEW
philosophy.description: We believe that true style doesn't shout. It whispers. Our t-shirts are designed with a focus on silhouette, texture, and durability. No loud logos, just perfect fit and premium materials.

newsletter.heading: JOIN THE INNER CIRCLE
newsletter.description: Be the first to know about new collection drops and exclusive events.

footer.description: Redefining the modern wardrobe through minimalist design and premium craftsmanship. Join our journey towards sustainable, timeless fashion.

about.heading: ABOUT THREADLY
about.description: We're dedicated to creating premium quality t-shirts with perfect fit and attention to detail.
